title: Good Omens | I'll See Your Heart And I'll Raise You Mine - [Aziraphale + Crowley]
author: Sleuthette
comment:
I have no words. Have my heart ❤️

I’d never heard this song til now, and the more I heard, the more I realized just how them this song is. Right down to the intense emotional sense and pining I get just listening to it. I can’t get over how perfectly you synched up the scenes with the lyrics! Your video is such a beautiful and amazing tribute to them and their relationship.

Crowley had a hand in this song, most definitely 🤣

This is so good!! ❤

I knew someone in this platform HAD TO vid this song with this ship, the first time I listen to this song I though of them, because it's basically their whole dinamic and relationship. And you... You my dear, you made such a beautiful video, using the perfect footage for every lyric... This has become my favorite fanvid of them. So thank you!
This is perfect. . .right down to "things going pear-shaped."  I like pears. :)

Holy cow! Finally!!!!! Finaaaallllllyyy! I have known of this song for basically a decade now (it was used in another ship video for a different show) and as soon as I watched Good Omens when it premiered I remembered this song and thought it would perfect for them! And this video is so well done!!!
description:
Fandom: Good Omens
Song: I'll See Your Heart And I'll Raise You Mine
Artist: Bell X1

This song couldn't be more Them and I love that I can finally make the fanvids I've been imagining in my head for years.
